text: Eric Wayne Burlison (born October 2, 1976) is an American politician. He has been the U.S. representative from Missouri's 7th congressional district since 2023. He was the representative for District 133 in the Missouri House of Representatives. He is a Republican. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congressman Eric Burlison official U.S. House website *Eric Burlison for Congress * * Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Missouri Category:People from Springfield, Missouri Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Eric Burlison
